mapper.insert: INSERT INTO solution_report (problem_id, creator_id, title, content, is_published, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{problemId}, #{creatorId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{isPublished}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT sr.report_id, sr.problem_id, sr.title, sr.content, sr.creator_id, u.nickname AS creator_name, sr.created_at FROM solution_report sr LEFT JOIN user u ON sr.creator_id = u.user_id WHERE sr.problem_id = #{problemId} AND sr.is_published = 1 ORDER BY sr.created_at DESC

SELECT sr.report_id, sr.problem_id, sr.title, sr.content, sr.creator_id, u.nickname AS creator_name, sr.created_at FROM solution_report sr LEFT JOIN user u ON sr.creator_id = u.user_id WHERE sr.report_id = #{reportId}
